title: Residential Tenancies Act 2016 (No. 17 of 2016)) of the Residential Tenancies
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Administrative
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Administrative 

Area of Westmeath County Council) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited rent pressure zone (administrative area westmeath county council) order 2023

title: Residential Tenancies Act 2016 (No. 17 of 2016)) of the Residential Tenancies
heading: 2. The Order comes into operation on 30 November 2023.
text_raw: 2. The Order comes into operation on 30 November 2023.

title: Residential Tenancies Act 2016 (No. 17 of 2016)) of the Residential Tenancies
heading: 3. The area consisting of the Administrative Area of Westmeath County
text_raw:
3. The area consisting of the Administrative Area of Westmeath County 
Council is prescribed as a rent pressure zone during the period commencing on 
30 November 2023 and ending on 31 December 2024. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 November, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [579] 3
text_norm: 3 area consisting administrative area westmeath county council prescribed rent pressure zone period commencing 30 november 2023 ending 31 december 2024 given official seal 27 november 2023 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 1st december 2023 579 3

title: Residential Tenancies Act 2016 (No. 17 of 2016)) of the Residential Tenancies
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order provides for the designation of the Administrative Area of 
Westmeath County Council as a rent pressure zone under section 24A of the 
Residential Tenancies Act 2004 (as inserted by section 36 of the Planning and 
Development (Housing) and Residential Tenancies Act 2016), for the period 
commencing on 30 November 2023 and ending on 31 December 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [579]
